summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of East Union Street from Broadway to 34th Avenue and certain other streets and avenues by the construction of a safety lighting system, adding a street thereto, increasing the expenditure to be made from the Seattle General Street Lighting Bonds 1948 Fund therefor from Thirty-Nine Thousand Dollars ($39,000.00) to Forty-two Thousand Dollars ($42,000.00), and amending Sections 1 and 2 of Ordinance No. 80205 as amended by Ordinance No. 80456.
